      • getOrderFileName

        java.lang.String getOrderFileName​(java.time.LocalDate orderDate)
        Gets the Order file name from its order date
        Parameters:

      • readFile

        java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> readFile​(java.lang.String fileName,
                                            FileHeaders fileType)
                                     throws FlooringMasteryPersistenceException
        Opens fileName.txt file. It then transfers info into a ArrayList to hold in memory. The file name only needs the name of the file, not the directory path
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file being read (not the directory path)
        fileType - the type of file being read (Tax, Product or Order)
        Returns:
        ArrayList of String Arrays of the split up file lines
        Throws:
        FlooringMasteryPersistenceException

      • readTaxFile

        void readTaxFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
          throws FlooringMasteryPersistenceException
        Converts the Info from a Tax file into a Tax map. It clears it before writing in it.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file being read
        Throws:
        FlooringMasteryPersistenceException

      • readProductFile

        void readProductFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
              throws FlooringMasteryPersistenceException
        Converts the Info from a Product file into a Product map. It clears it before writing in it.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file being read
        Throws:
        FlooringMasteryPersistenceException

      • readOrderFile

        void readOrderFile​(java.lang.String fileName,
                   java.time.LocalDate date)
            throws FlooringMasteryPersistenceException
        Converts the Info from an Order file into an Order map. It clears it before writing in it.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file being read
        date - date of the order
        Throws:
        FlooringMasteryPersistenceException

      • writeOrderFile

        void writeOrderFile​(java.lang.String fileName)
             throws FlooringMasteryPersistenceException
        Used to write the Order Map to an Order .txt file
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the file being written
        Throws:
        FlooringMasteryPersistenceException

      • writeBackupOrderFile

        void writeBackupOrderFile()
                   throws FlooringMasteryPersistenceException
        Used to write all the orders in Files/Orders dir to a single Backup .txt file
        Throws:
        FlooringMasteryPersistenceException

      • appendToBackupOrderFile

        void appendToBackupOrderFile​(java.util.List<java.lang.String[]> splitLineList,
                             java.time.LocalDate date)
                      throws FlooringMasteryPersistenceException
        Used to write a ListArray from an Order file into a Backup.txt file. Appending it, not overwriting it.
        Parameters:
        splitLineList - ListArray created from readFile method
        Throws:
        FlooringMasteryPersistenceException

      • createNewOrder

        void createNewOrder​(Order addOrder,
                    java.lang.String fileName)
             throws FlooringMasteryPersistenceException
        Adds a given Order to the order File of its date, only if the given order passes all the business rules.
        Parameters:
        addOrder - Order object to be added
        Throws:
        FlooringMasteryPersistenceException

        void configOrder​(Order order)

      • addOrderToFile

        void addOrderToFile​(Order order,
                    java.lang.String fileName)
             throws FlooringMasteryPersistenceException
        Adds new order to the Order map, then writes the Map into the corresponding Order file
        Parameters:
        order - order object that is being added to Map
        Throws:
        FlooringMasteryPersistenceException

      • SearchOrderDateFile

        void SearchOrderDateFile​(java.time.LocalDate orderDate,
                         java.lang.String fileName)
                  throws FlooringMasteryPersistenceException
        Reads the order file of the given Order Date into the orderMap then unmarshells it to the Map If the Order doesn't exist, it will throw an exception instead. Use for
        Parameters:
        orderDate - date of the Order to display
        Throws:
        FlooringMasteryPersistenceException - missing file

      • getAllOrders

        java.util.List<Order> getAllOrders()
        Returns a List Array of all orders for the current orderMap
        Returns:
        List Array of all orders for the current orderMap

      • findOrderNumber

        Order findOrderNumber​(int orderNumber)
               throws FlooringMasteryPersistenceException
        Finds an Order in the Order Map based on its Order Number. If there is no Order Number in Map, it will return Null
        Parameters:
        orderNumber - order number of Order
        Returns:
        Order object
        Throws:
        FlooringMasteryPersistenceException

      • removeOrderToFile

        void removeOrderToFile​(Order order,
                       java.lang.String fileName)
                throws FlooringMasteryPersistenceException
        Removes an order from Order Map, then writes the Map onto its corresponding Order file
        Parameters:
        order - order being removed
        Throws:
        FlooringMasteryPersistenceException
